participant_1.background:
My family is my favorite people on Earth, but I don't like when they mess up my organizing schemes.
i have sausage fingers.
i love agatha christie novels.
I used to play with animals, but now I'm too busy with my work.
i love to take road trips.

participant_2.background:
I once pretended to be my girlfriend, Luis, in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
as a child , i won a national spelling bee.
my favorite truck is a chevy duramax.
I'm a busy mom who is always on the go, but I always make time for my morning coffee.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.

content.text: I'm a mom who is always on the go, but I make time for my morning coffee. What's your favorite thing to do in the morning?
I'm a busy mom, too. I always make time for my morning coffee and gummy worm collection. I just wish I knew where I belonged in the world.
I hear you! I love my family, but they can be a bit much sometimes. I'm not sure where I belong in the world either. But I know I love to take road trips. What's your favorite way to travel?
I love taking road trips, too! It's so fun to see new places and meet new people. I once pretended to be my girlfriend, Luis, in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
That's hilarious! I've never done anything like that. I once got out of a speeding ticket by pretending to be a pregnant woman.
That's a good one! I'm not sure I could pull that off.
Neither could I. But it worked!
Well, I'm glad you're okay! I'm always careful not to speed.
Me too. But sometimes it's just so tempting!
I love talking to you. You're so funny and relatable!
Thanks! I love talking to you too. You're so sweet and kind!
